title: Stryker introduces Mako Handheld Robotics with RPS launch
description:
New handheld robotic system combines Stryker’s proven Mako robotic technology with its power tool capabilities.

The post Stryker introduces Mako Handheld Robotics with RPS launch appeared first on The Robot Report.
